data.name: Guilty Gear -Strive- Ultimate Edition Content Kit DLC
data.detailed_description:
*This content kit does not include the main game of the Guilty Gear -Strive-.
*This product contains only the extra content included in Guilty Gear -Strive- Ultimate Edition 2022.
*Please be aware that it does not contain the GGST Season Pass 1 included in Guilty Gear -Strive- Ultimate Edition.

[Ultimate Edition Content Kit Content]
・Digital Sound & Artwork
・GGST Ultimate Edition Special Colors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-3450, 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6870, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
